headline: Morgan Stanley Raises its Price Target on Applied Materials, Inc. (AMAT) to $420 and Keeps an Overweight Rating
summary: Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) is among the 12 Best Tech Stocks that Beat Earnings Estimates. On February 13, 2026, Morgan Stanley analyst Shane Brett raised the price target on Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) to $420 from $364 and kept an Overweight rating. Shane Brett said a beat-and-raise quarter, combined with 20%+ systems guidance, marks a […]

summary: Tech and world leaders flocked to New Delhi for the India AI Impact Summit
